elements.title: #169 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#169
June 18, 2021
fixed
‚≠êÔ∏è Improvements
  • Crypto balances will show all available decimal places (it was truncated to 5 before)
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed bug where rules were sometimes not running for transactions
  • Fixed a visual bug where some transactions displayed with two checkmarks

elements.title: #168 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#168
June 9, 2021
new
improved
Developer API
üéÅ New Features
  • New API endpoints for transaction groups: POST /v1/transactions/group, DELETE /v1/transactions/group/:transaction_id
‚≠êÔ∏è Improvements
  • New option for POST /v1/transactions and PUT /v1/transactions: skip_balance_update (meaning the balance will update by default, if applicable)
  • New fields returned for GET /v1/transactions: original_name, type, subtype, fees, price, quantity
  • New filter options for GET /v1/transactions: status, is_group, group_id
Go to API docs.

elements.title: #167 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#167
June 7, 2021
improved
fixed
‚≠êÔ∏è Improvements
  • Reduce line tension in budget graph to 0 for straight lines
  • Emails for transaction notifications now come from notification@lunchmoney.app
  • Tooltip now displays change in absolute value in net worth tracker
  • New cash account types for manually-managed assets: gift card and store credit
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed a bug that caused incorrect sorting of account names for some users

elements.title: #166 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#166
June 3, 2021
new
improved
fixed
üéÅ New Features
  • Importing
    tags
    and
    currency
    via the CSV importer is now supported! Note: tags must be a comma-separated value
‚≠êÔ∏è Improvements
  • Empty payee names are allowed when importing CSV file. Date and amount are required.
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed a bug that caused problems with deduplicating transactions where the payee names contains a special character, like a slash (/)
  • Fixed a bug that was causing non-recurring transactions to show up when choosing a recurring item to link to
  • Fixed a bug where a rogue rule with an empty payee name caused the rule to run every time

elements.title: #165 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#165
May 27, 2021
new
Developer API
üéÅ New Features
  • New budget API endpoints: GET /v1/budgets, PUT /v1/budgets, DELETE /v1/budgets
  • New crypto API endpoints: GET /v1/crypto, PUT /v1/crypto/manual/:id
  • New fields for GET /v1/assets: display_name and closed_on
Go to API docs.

elements.title: #164 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#164
May 23, 2021
fixed
‚≠êÔ∏è Improvements
  • If a category group's budget has been set, the system will no longer consider any of its sub-category budgets to be unset
  • On the Main page, subcategories are sorted within each group according to the table sort setting
  • The help/feedback dialog when submitting a bug will no longer close if you click outside the area
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed inconsistency bug around number of recurring items to review
  • Fixed incorrect "Created on" date for manually-managed assets

elements.title: #163 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#163
May 22, 2021
fixed
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed a bug that caused problems when reporting an incorrect account balance
  • Fixed a UI bug where the screen would jump up when adding new tags
  • Fixed a bug where autocomplete was not working properly

elements.title: #162 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#162
May 11, 2021
fixed
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed a bug in our CSV importing causing transactions to not be added when selecting Cash account
  • Fixed a bug where creating a new rule with an account as a condition showed the error "Missing account!"
  • Fixed a bug in API where external_id was not being returned

elements.title: #161 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#161
April 19, 2021
fixed
üîß Bug Fixes
  • Fixed alignment issues in Query Tool seen in Firefox on Windows
  • Fixed issue where NaN% or Infinity% would display for savings rate on Overview page
  • Fixed issue where selecting "Last year" has no response in the Overview page
  • Fixed issue with sorting by billing date in Recurring Items page
  • Fixed issue with blank account names in the asset selector in the CSV importing tool

elements.title: #160 (Lunchmoney Changelog)
elements.contents:
#160
April 14, 2021
improved
new
üéÅ New Features
  • New options for rule actions: don't create a new rule, and don't link to recurring
  • Rules now get applied on manual input
‚≠êÔ∏è Improvements
  • Refactored the codepath for inserting transactions (impacts manual input, CSV upload, API and Plaid syncing)
  • Redesigned the add/edit rule modal
